search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Viral Loops (viral-loops.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Viral Loops can be found at: [https://viral-loops.com/pricing](https://viral-loops.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Pricing | Viral Loops
===============
      

[![Image 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ecfee3d3c78d12514ee78db/5ed63acc2fa3db292bb8dbfc_5e78c57b7cdb82506b10a5c5_viral-loops-logo(full)-black-1-1.svg)](https://viral-loops.com/)

Use Cases

Saas

[2-way referral program](https://viral-loops.com/templates/altruistic-referral)[Milestone-based referral program](https://viral-loops.com/templates/milestone-referral)[Waiting list for upcoming SaaS](https://viral-loops.com/use-cases/prelaunch-referral-waitlist)

Events

[Giveaway for pre-sale tickets](https://viral-loops.com/templates/sweepstake)[Giveaway for pre-sale tickets (leaderboard)](https://viral-loops.com/templates/leaderboard-giveaway)[Waiting list for an upcoming event](https://viral-loops.com/use-cases/prelaunch-referral-waitlist)

Creators & Media

[Newsletter referral program](https://viral-loops.com/templates/newsletter-referral-software)[Upcoming community waitlist](https://viral-loops.com/use-cases/prelaunch-referral-waitlist)[Entries-based giveaway](https://viral-loops.com/templates/sweepstake)

Tech & Apps

[Early adopters before launching](https://viral-loops.com/use-cases/prelaunch-referral-waitlist)[Better rewards with more referrals](https://viral-loops.com/templates/milestone-referral)[2-way referral program](https://viral-loops.com/templates/altruistic-referral)

E-commerce

[Shopify store referral program](https://viral-loops.com/templates/shopify)[Store coming soon](https://viral-loops.com/use-cases/prelaunch-referral-waitlist)[Entries-based giveaway](https://viral-loops.com/templates/sweepstake)

[Saas](https://viral-loops.com/pricing#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0)[Events](https://viral-loops.com/pricing#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1)[Creators & Media](https://viral-loops.com/pricing#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2)[Tech & Apps](https://viral-loops.com/pricing#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3)[E-commerce](https://viral-loops.com/pricing#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4)

[**2-way referral program** Your users refer other businesses, and both sides get rewarded when the referred business upgrades to a paid plan. (With conversion tracking)](https://viral-loops.com/templates/altruistic-referral)[**Waiting list for upcoming SaaS** Create a referral waiting list before you launch to get early adopters and market validation.](https://viral-loops.com/use-cases/prelaunch-referral-waitlist)

[**Milestone-based referral program** The more successful referrals your users make, the better rewards they unlock. (With conversion tracking)](https://viral-loops.com/templates/milestone-referral)

[**Giveaway for pre-sale tickets** People sign up and refer friends to win a free ticket. If they don't win, they get early access to the pre-sale.](https://viral-loops.com/templates/sweepstake)[**Waiting list for an upcoming event** People join the waiting list, refer their friends to climb the queue and get early access to the tickets or the event.](https://viral-loops.com/use-cases/prelaunch-referral-waitlist)

[**Giveaway for pre-sale tickets (leaderboard)** A referral giveaway with a social element—people see a leaderboard of who's winning the giveaway.](https://viral-loops.com/templates/leaderboard-giveaway)

[**Newsletter referral program** Create an in-email referral program to reward your newsletter readers for inviting more subscribers.](https://viral-loops.com/templates/newsletter-referral-software)[**Entries-based giveaway** Your existing audience refers their friends to increase their chances of winning a prize.](https://viral-loops.com/templates/sweepstake)

[**Upcoming community waitlist** Find early community members with a referral waitlist where people refer friends to climb the queue and get exclusive access.](https://viral-loops.com/use-cases/prelaunch-referral-waitlist)

[**Early adopters before launching** People get early access to your product when they reach the top of the waiting list by referring friends.](https://viral-loops.com/use-cases/prelaunch-referral-waitlist)[**2-way referral program** Your users referer their friends, and both sides get rewarded when the friend makes a purchase.](https://viral-loops.com/templates/altruistic-referral)

[**Better rewards with more referrals** Set milestones with a tiered referral system, offering better prizes as they reach each milestone.](https://viral-loops.com/templates/milestone-referral)

[**Shopify store referral program** Create an ongoing referral program using our Shopify App to reward your customers for referring friends.](https://viral-loops.com/templates/shopify)[**Entries-based giveaway** New and existing customers refer friends to increase their chances of winning a prize.](https://viral-loops.com/templates/sweepstake)

[Store coming soon Create a referral waiting list for your upcoming store to collect email addresses.](https://viral-loops.com/use-cases/prelaunch-referral-waitlist)

### Running a large-scale campaign?  
‍[Contact us](https://viral-loops.com/book-a-demo) for a quote or demo.

### Viral Loops Fully Managed Service

Get a referral marketing expert to design & execute your campaigns.

[Learn more ‍](https://viral-loops.com/book-a-demo)

### FAQ.



#### HOW DO YOU MEASURE PARTICIPANTS?  

Every visitor that joins one of your campaigns (either directly or through a referral) counts as a Participant. Participants are counted **uniquely**, across all your campaigns (you can have unlimited campaigns!).



#### WHAT WILL I NEED TO INSTALL VIRAL-WIDGET ON MY WEBSITE OR IN MY APP?  

Adding the **Viral-Widget** to your website is very simple. You just need to add a small piece of JavaScript code on every page where you want your campaigns to run.



#### DO I NEED TO BE A DEVELOPER TO USE VIRAL LOOPS?  

Nope. Creating and launching campaigns is easy as 1-2-3. You will just need to be able to install our JavaScript code to your website to launch your campaigns. A little bit of HTML knowledge is all that's necessary to do that. And if you need a hand, we're always here to help!



#### HOW DOES THE FREE TRIAL WORK?  

You can make unlimited use of our [Growing plan](https://viral-loops.com/product-updates/milestone-notifications "Milestone notifications") for **free for 14 days** for up to 10 participants. At any point during your trial, choose the plan that suits you best and subscribe using your credit card.



#### WHAT HAPPENS AT THE END OF MY TRIAL?  

If you have not subscribed to any plan by the end of your trial, your campaigns will continue receiving submissions but you will not be able to create new ones. You won't be able to access them and export the emails you have collected. You will need to subscribe to one of our plans in order to access your campaigns!



#### I HAVE MORE QUESTIONS. WHERE CAN I FIND ANSWERS?  

No worries! Please get in touch with us at  
[hello@viral-loops.com](mailto:hello@viral-loops.com), we'll get back to you ASAP!
